title: How do I generate my personal GCash QR
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

To **avoid mistakes and make sure your money is sent to the right person**, create your FREE personal QR Code. Other banks or e-wallets might charge InstaPay fees.

You can generate and download your Personal QR Code for future use using one of these two options:

### **Option 1:** via the QR Button

1. Open the GCash app and tap **QR**
2. Tap **Generate QR**
3. Select **Receive Money via QR Code**

### **Option 2:** via Send

1. Open the GCash app and tap **Send**
2. Tap **Generate QR**

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How can I send money in GCash via QR code?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005327223)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614)
- [Can I send money to a non-GCash user?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900006976943)
